predicate.note: Frames file for 'drift' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and comparison with Chris' old drift file. Well, not so much, since that's not how we're doing things these days. Comparison with 'move' instead.

example.name: with LOC
example.text: The Dow Jones Industrial Average...drifted on either side of its previous close and finished with a gain of just 0.82 at 2645.90.
example.arg: on either side of its previous close

example.name: with DIR
example.text: Growth stocks may underperform cyclical stocks next year if the Federal Reserve begins to let interest rates drift sufficiently lower to boost the economy.
